sqlMap.select: SELECT FingerPrintID AS employeeId, Format(PersonalActivityDate,'dd/MM/YYYY') AS attendanceDate, Min(TimeOut) AS checkIn, Max(TimeOut) AS checkOut FROM PersonalActivity WHERE NOT(TimeOut = '') AND Format(PersonalActivityDate,'dd/MM/YYYY') >= #syncDateMM# AND Format(PersonalActivityDate,'dd/MM/YYYY') < Format(Date(),'dd/MM/YYYY') GROUP BY FingerPrintID, PersonalActivityDate ORDER BY 2, 3
